ProjectTitle: Discrepancy and Energy on compact Riemannian manifolds
InitialFeedbackHistory:
21/02/2025
Storage: it is more secure to use a storage solution offered by KU Leuven ICTS, please have a look in the storage guide for recommendations: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. Will you use github or gitlab for code? https://admin.kuleuven.be/icts/english/research/software/GITLAB
Preservation: All research data that you generate during your research at KU Leuven needs to remain at KU Leuven for 10 years. To bring them with you when you leave you need to either share it openly so anyone can reuse them, or you need a data transfer agreement. 
Sharing: to assign a persistent identifier to your data you can upload them in RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard
label: good with suggestions
